answers.answer: If you over eat and eat only bad stuff then yes you would have a Biger babies as well as you could have diabetes do not overdo it eat healthy

According to my doctor my baby is big and I have a hard time eating and have since day 1. My husband says I eat like a rabbit. But it's just me and my horrible nausea. I've only ly gained 14 lbs and I'll be 34 weeks tomorrow.
I eat mostly healthy and exercise and I'm already 18 lbs uo at 21 wks. Ultrasound says baby is already 1 lb. Big babies run in my family. I'm still worried about diabetes and preeclampsia :(
I have type 1 diabetes but they say it's type 2 that have the bigger baby's. I only eat 4 times a day and I am constantly walking

I gained 65 pounds my first pregnancy my baby boy was 6 pounds, second pregnancy i gained 30 pounds and the baby was 7 pounds so i don't  think the baby weight really depends on how much you eat,  its your weight depends on what and how much you eat

question: 23 weeks pregnant. Is it true the more you eat while pregnant it makes your baby bigger?
